criteria.criterion: make release-check is first-class and reproducible.
criteria.remediation_hint: define a deterministic release-check flow and retain command evidence markers

criteria.criterion: Criterion mapping diagnostics are explicit and artifact-linked.
criteria.remediation_hint: regenerate criteria diagnostics so every criterion has status and evidence pointers

criteria.criterion: CLI bundle generation and re-verification are documented and operable.
criteria.remediation_hint: validate bundle generation and re-verification flow with deterministic evidence

criteria.criterion: Tool adapter and skill manifest templates exist with verification checklists.
criteria.remediation_hint: add or refresh contributor templates and link them to release verification steps

criteria.criterion: Rollout assets enforce LangGraph-only orchestration and remove legacy path.
criteria.remediation_hint: remove legacy-path rollout language and keep LangGraph-only policy explicit

criteria.criterion: Compatibility guardrails are verified as non-breaking.
criteria.remediation_hint: verify CLI surface, schema semantics, and release anchors remain backward-compatible
